required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Evaluation of Lung Pathology in Subjects With COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: Non-interventional, Retrospective, Multicenter, Follow-up Study Evaluating the Effect of C21 on Lung Pathology in Subjects Previously Hospitalized With COVID-19 and Enrolled in the VP-C21-006 Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Non-interventional, retrospective, multi-center, follow-up study evaluating the effect of C21 on lung pathology in subjects previously hospitalised with COVID-19 and enrolled in the VP-C21-006 trial.

detailed_description.textblock:
The study will collect available HRCT scans obtained prior to, during treatment with C21 or placebo and up to 24 weeks after trial completion.
HRCT scans will be assessed for ground glass opacity, reticulation, band opacity, fibrosis and consolidation by a central, blinded HRCT reader.

primary_outcome.measure: Averaged total lung score for both lungs percent measured by per lung percent scores
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 weeks after completion of VP-C21-006
primary_outcome.description: Based on ground glass opacity, reticulation, band opacity, fibrosis and consolidation, on HRCT

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in percent lung involvement measured totally (averaged total lung score for both lungs percent) and by each of ground glass opacity, reticulation, band opacity, fibrosis and consolidation on follow-up HRCT
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 weeks after completion of VP-C21-006

arm_group.description: Subject treated with C21 in the VP-C21-006 trial
Subject treated with placebo in the VP-C21-006 trial

study_pop.textblock: Subjects with a previous COVID-19 infection enrolled in the VP-C21-006 trial.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Written informed consent
- Previously included in the VP-C21-006 trial and received at least one dose of investigational medicinal product (IMP)
- Available record of at least one HRCT performed within 24 weeks after completion of VP-C21-006.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participation in another interventional trial during the historical period covered by this study that could interfere with the study objectives or evaluation

facility.name: Department of Medicine, Civil Hospital and B J Medical College
First Floor Clinical Research Department Rhythm Heart Institute
Department of Medicine, Government Medical College and Hospital
Department of Medicine, Noble Hospitals Pvt. Ltd

reference.citation: Tornling G, et al. The angiotensin type 2 receptor agonist C21 restores respiratory function in COVID19 - a double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled Phase 2 trial, medRxiv, 2021
